name: cid-express-react-app
description: Full-stack application with Express backend and React frontend

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm run test:ci
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test:watch" "cd frontend && npm run test:watch"
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.audit: cd backend && npm run audit && cd ../frontend && npm run audit
scripts.audit:fix: cd backend && npm run audit:fix && cd ../frontend && npm run audit:fix
scripts.security: cd backend && npm run security && cd ../frontend && npm run security
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run audit && npm run test
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run migrate

author: sangarinirals
